name: Viyog
description:
NOTE
This game was made in GB Studio for the Gameboy color
The game is in English, but the puzzles are in Hindi- don't freak out! 

CONTROLS
DPad = Arrow Keys 
Start = Enter
A = Z
B = X

SUMMARY

Viyog tells the story of Lakshman from Ramayanthrough expressive typographic puzzles. 

Lakshman forever lived in his big brother Ram's shadow. While his entire life was marked by his devotion to his brother,  his final journey to death is filled with confusion and conflict. Solve the puzzle in each chapter to find out a little more about the brother in the shadows. 

The prototype shows the beginning of the story, why is Lakshman on his journey to death? Play to find out!

TEAM
Amar Ravi - Game Developer
Vaibhav Kataria - Game Artist
